Name: sls

Arguments.Name: --conceal
Arguments.Description: Hide secrets from the output (e.g. API Gateway key values)

Arguments.Name: --verbose
Arguments.Description: Show all stack events during deployment

Arguments.Name: --force
Arguments.Description: Forces a deployment to take place
